title: Arabella's Circus
description: Arabella's Circus is a childrens toy and costume shop, selling pieces inspired by the 19th century circuses, hosted on Big Cartel.
The website is a custom theme I created for the client in Shopify's Liquid templating language, with custom JavaScript to work with Big Cartel's JavaScript API in order to make the shop interactive.

title: OperaOmniaTracker
description: OperaOmniaTracker is an ongoing personal project I created to track progress in the game, Dissidia Final Fantasy: Opera Omnia.
The frontend is a Nuxt.js app that is statically generated and hosted on Netlify.
The data for the app is stored in a PostgresQL database, with the Hasura GraphQL Engine being used to create an API.
